overview: SUMMERTIME and the LIVIN' IS EASY!!!You're invited to PEACH'S BIKINI BASH, a sun-drenched parade of tanned and tantalizing beauties guaranteed to raise the temperature more than a few degrees. Take a poolside seat and watch as these luscious ladies slip into-and out of-their sexiest bikinis and lingerie, causing a wave of erotic excitement. Loaded with digital goodies such as multi-camera angles and bonus scenes. BIKINI BASH will leave you CRAZY FROM THE HEAT!
tagline: Summer has never been this hot!
title: Bikini Bash
